name: Suggest Task Assignment
description:
Get AI-powered task assignment suggestions based on team member skills, capacity, performance, and task requirements. Uses intelligent routing engine to recommend optimal assignees.

** WHEN TO USE **
- When a new task needs to be assigned
- To find the best team member for a specific task
- To understand why a particular assignment is recommended
- To compare multiple assignment options

** HOW IT WORKS **
- Analyzes task complexity, required skills, and urgency
- Evaluates team member skills, current workload, and performance history
- Calculates match scores based on multiple factors (skills 30%, capacity 25%, performance 20%, context 15%, collaboration 10%)
- Returns top suggestions with detailed reasoning and estimated completion times

** RETURNS **
- Top 3 assignment suggestions with confidence scores
- Detailed reasoning for each suggestion
- Estimated completion times
- Potential risks and benefits
- Alternative options

** EXAMPLE **
{
  "taskDetails": {
    "title": "Implement React authentication flow",
    "description": "Build secure login/logout with JWT tokens",
    "tags": ["react", "auth", "security"],
    "priority": "high",
    "estimatedHours": 16
  },
  "maxSuggestions": 3,
  "includeReasoning": true
}

Returns suggestions like: Sarah (92% match, React expert, available now) vs Mike (78% match, security background, 65% loaded)

taskId.description: Optional task ID if analyzing an existing task

teamMembers.description: Optional: Only consider these specific team member IDs

maxSuggestions.description: Maximum number of suggestions to return
